scripts.sb:reset: pnpm supabase db reset && pnpm supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts && prettier --write ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts
scripts.sb:typegen: pnpm supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts && prettier --write ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts
